title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: While using code assist, the file appears to be dirtied even though no changes have been made to it.
OB: When code assist is triggered, the file is marked as dirtied even though there are no actual changes made to it. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied when code assist is triggered without making any changes. Code assist should also be displayed as expected.
SR: Investigate the source of the issue and fix the behavior of code assist to accurately reflect file changes and ensure it appears correctly.
